modShortDescription: Did you want the crosshair off? This 7 Days to Die mod removes crosshairs while aiming down the sight with ranged weapons. Now that the crosshair gone.
modDescription:
Did you want the crosshair off? This 7 Days to Die mod removes crosshairs while aiming down the sight with ranged weapons except for Bows. Now that the crosshair gone, the [weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) will be more useful.

[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/TSBX-7D/Modlets/tree/master/TSBX_noADScrosshair)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8169-tsbx-collection/).

**Credits:** [TSBX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/tsbx/)
